text: Thomas Joseph Polanic (April 2, 1943 â€“ September 22, 2019) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He was born in Toronto. Polanic played 19 games in the National Hockey League for the Minnesota North Stars between 1965 through 1977. He was born in Toronto. Polanic died on September 22, 2019 in Toronto at the age of 76.Thomas Joseph Polanic ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:2019 deaths Category:Minnesota North Stars players Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto Category:Eastern Hockey League players
